meanings.definition: An action or event in opposition to a protest.
meanings.sent1: The counterprotests gathered peacefully across the street from the main protest.
meanings.sent2: The city saw multiple counterprotests against the new law.
meanings.sent3: The counterprotests brought colorful signs and catchy chants.
meanings.sent4: The counterprotests were a symphony of voices against injustice.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the counterprotests lingered in the minds of the protesters.

meanings.definition: To engage in opposition to a protest.
meanings.sent1: She decided to counterprotest the rally in support of her cause.
meanings.sent2: Many people choose to counterprotest peacefully to express their disagreement.
meanings.sent3: The group counterprotests with determination and unity.
meanings.sent4: He counterprotests with passion and conviction.
meanings.sent5: The act of counterprotesting can bring about change in society.
